column5: Sometime over the next few months we are going to be having a major upgrade of the board software. Most of the changes go toward function and add some handy admin features as well. We will discuss over time which of the features will get added (some of them are either not relevant or just not worthwhile). If you have an appreciation for software you can watch the company owner and head developers blog here.. http://forums.invisionpower.com/blog/ips_news/index.php?
Hopefully all this will be compatible with VISTA?
Sure it will be O.K with Vista, the mods are just updating the web site it will have no effect with OS compatibility.
I checked out that link Rick - but it's not in English - or at least no English that I understand - lol   Don
